sentences.english: Analysis of grounded overvoltage through arc at field has been also carried out.
sentences.chinese: 并对实际发生的弧光接地过电压进行了分析。

sentences.english: After switching on powerful arc lights, they saw great stalagmites.
sentences.chinese: 他们打开强力弧光灯，看见一株株巨大的石笋。

sentences.english: If the arc lamps are almost new, proceed as follows.
sentences.chinese: 如果弧光灯几乎是新的，请照下面的继续。

sentences.english: When the arc short circuit happens, this way can also give fast protection.
sentences.chinese: 在线路发生弧光短路时，也能快速实现保护。

sentences.english: Arc lamps require a current-limiting ballast .
sentences.chinese: 弧光灯需要一个限流镇流器。

sentences.english: Outside the arc-light shone through the bare branches of a tree.
sentences.chinese: 外面弧光灯的亮光透过光秃的树枝。

sentences.english: Arc lamps require a current- limiting ballast.
sentences.chinese: 弧光灯需要一个限流镇流器。

sentences.english: After switching on powerful arc lights.
You'd need arcs or strobe lights for that kind of effect, even in this feeble, fading light.
sentences.chinese: 这就要有弧光灯或者闪光灯，虽然光线已经非常弱。

sentences.english: No colour fade after 300 hours close distant exposure to arc lamps.
sentences.chinese: 以炭精弧光灯近距离照射300小时，油漆没有褪色。

sentences.english: The arc lamps should be replaced soon.
sentences.chinese: 弧光灯应该马上更换掉。

sentences.english: Fluorescent is a low pressure mercury-smoke arc discharge lamp.
sentences.chinese: 日光灯是一种低气压的汞蒸气弧光放电灯。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan
cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
water screen (screen formed of sprayed water droplets, used for displaying projected images, for temperature control, or for air purification)
